alert.note: Alert for Alamance; Guilford (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 3:11PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Alamance and southeastern Guilford Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 311 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near McLeansville, or 8 miles east of Greensboro, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Greensboro, Burlington, McLeansville, Elon, Gibsonville, Alamance, Lake Mackintosh Marina, Lake Guilford Mackintosh Marina and Forest Oaks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
